yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.touchLo: How many degrees to turn when a bonobo taps the screen in a direction.
How many degrees to turn per second to complete a tap.
For total time, divide degrees per tap by looking speed.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.vertica: How long to wait before resetting the vertical look angle after a bonobo stops looking up or down.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.maxMinV: The maximum and minimum vertical degrees a bonobo can look up and down.
Setting to 0 will completely prevent vertical rotation, setting to 90 will completely unlock vertical rotation.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.touchFo: The radius of the circle in the center of the screen in which a bonobo can tap to walk forward.
% is relative to the window's minimum dimension, width or height.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.walkFor: How long to walk forward when a bonobo taps the screen in the walk forward radius.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.forward: The color of the overlay that signifies where the monkey needs to tap to walk forward.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config:useEnha: Renders a colored overlay on the full face of blocks rather than an outline.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.blockHi: The color of the block highlight overlay.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.ignoreB: Bypasses the depth check when drawing the overlay so you see the back faces highlighted through the block.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.showCur: Makes the touchscreen cursor actually visible.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.largeEn: Renders end crystals at 2x size. This does not affect the enlarged hitbox.
yacl3.config:kanzicontorl:config.hideCro: Hides the crosshair at all times whilst the mod is loaded.
yacl3.config.kanzicontrol:config.speechE: Makes the narrator read out the lexigram the bonobo pressed.
